channel.title: Application Builder on MeVisLab Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Application Builder on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Step 5: Review - Installer creation
item.description: Step 5: Review - Installer creation Introduction Your Macro module has been tested manually and/or automatically? Then you should create your first installable executable and deliver it to your customer(s) for final evaluation. Licensing:  This step requires a valid MeVisLab ApplicationBuilder license. It extends the MeVisLab SDK so that you can generate an installer of your developed Macro module. Free evaluation licenses of the MeVisLab ApplicationBuilder, time-limited to 3 months, can be requested at sales(at)mevislab.
